DOC.brief_summary: To describe the way statins are used in France in primary care, that is to determine patients profile (particularly CV risk factors), to determine the way statins are initiated by general practitioners, to evaluate aftercare and to assess patients treated by rosuvastatin
DOC.brief_title: Observational Usage Study of Statins in Primary Care in France
DOC.criteria: Patients to whom a statin was initiated or switched between 3 and 6 months before consultation
